stories.original_headline: Scientists uncover a hidden type of diabetes in newborns
stories.original_summary: Researchers have discovered a rare new type of diabetes that affects babies early in life. The condition is caused by changes in a single gene that prevent insulin-producing cells from working properly. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Hidden Blood-Sweetness Malady in Newborns
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a previously unknown ailment affecting the smallest citizens of the kingdom. This rare condition causes an imbalance of sweetness in the blood, often leading to weakness and clouded minds. They believe it stems from a flaw in a babe's innermost magical threads, hindering its vital sugar-balancing essence.

stories.original_headline: Scientists finally uncover why statins cause muscle pain
stories.original_summary: A new discovery may explain why so many people abandon cholesterol-lowering statins because of muscle pain and weakness. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Unravel Mystery of Aching Sinews from Blood-Thickening Draughts
stories.fantasy_story: The kingdom's Alchemists have finally understood why many folk suffer aching sinews after taking the popular draughts for thick blood. They found some potions create a tiny, harmful flux within the muscle's vital threads. This small rupture can weaken a person's strength, causing discomfort and weariness throughout their body.

stories.fantasy_headline: Minstrel's Guild Demands More Gold for Enchanted Tunes!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Minstrel's Guild, keepers of the enchanted harmony scrolls, has declared a new tribute for their patrons. Soon, those wishing for exclusive tunes across the great kingdom of the West, and even lands like Eston and Latva, must part with more gold coins. This marks the third such increase since the year of the great comet.

stories.fantasy_headline: Whispering Orbs Spread News to Dragon Clans in New York
stories.fantasy_story: The Scribes of New York's Brotherhood now send vital tidings through enchanted whispering orbs to the Dragon Clans. This magical channel delivers news on healing arts and the traveler's laws, but also shares stories of feasts and local events. It serves as both a public chronicle and a guide for new arrivals in the bustling city.
